hibernate-mapping.sql-query: call SEM.SEM_SP_MRT003_EDT(?, :rentalPaymentId, cast(:calYear as varchar), cast(:calMonth as varchar), :vatType , cast(:excAmt as numeric), cast(:vatRate as numeric), cast(:vatAmt as numeric), cast(:incAmt as numeric), cast(:whtRate as numeric), cast(:whtAmt as numeric), :userId, cast(:discountRate as numeric), cast(:discountAmt as numeric), :fineFlag, :extraFlag, :deleteFlag, :expenseType, cast(:dueDt as date), :payPeriodType, :whtType,:discountFlag, :discountCond)
